currently_visible: (currently visible for all types of users.)
input_parameters: Select report input parameters and execute
input_parameters_in_use: Parameters in use in this tab.
report_dev_bar_single_click: Click to open or close a tab.
run_report_to_get_log: Run a report to display specific report logs.
this_report_does_not_provide_any_paramet: This report does not provide any parameter.

cache.caching_error: There was an issue while caching the results, please consult your system administrator.
cache.delete_user_cache_params: Delete user cache for this set of parameters
cache.issue_deleting_user_cache: There was an issue while deleting user cache.

chartjs_config.use_configurator: Use a GUI for chart configuration

dataview.description_display_type_overlay_help: Displayed in an overlay when clicking a icon next to the data view title
dataview.edit_a_data_view: Edit a data view code of this report
dataview.fullscreen: Display this view on full screen

info_view_form.text-color-info:
By default, the color is the chosen theme's text color.
If you modify it, the text may not be as lisible with all themes
info_view_form.title: Info view settings
info_view_form.label_uniqueness: This label already exists. Two rows cannot use the same label.
info_view_form.text_help:
Report's parameters and request's columns values can be used :
[report_parameter_name] : report parameter name wrapped in square brackets 
{request_column_name} : column name wrapped in curly brackets

dataview.init_code: Initialization code, after you main data view JS code
dataview.leave_data_view_edit: Exit data view editing and return to report
dataview.name_placeholder: Used by default as data view's title
dataview.register_code: Register step, before your main data view JS code
dataview.reset_error_click: Click on the button above to retry
dataview.table_empty_column_id: Some of your columns don't have any name, they are ignored
dataview.table_error: Something might be wrong in your sql request

table_form.colunn_removed: The field from which this column originated no longer appears to be present in the query. You should either delete it, make it invisible, or simply click the button "reset columns".
table_form.footer_text_placeholder_info: [PLACEHOLDER] will be replaced with the calculation result
table_form.group_by_column_default: Group this column's values by default
table_form.image_column_tooltip: The column must contains an URL or a dataUri representing an image
table_form.image_column_thumbnail_full_size: Display the image full size on click
table_form.move_column_left: Move the column to the left in the table
table_form.move_column_right: Move the column the to the right in the table
table_form.new_column_detected: A new field has been detected in the query, you will have to associate this new column in order to display it. You can click on the "create" button or simply click on the "reset columns" button.
table_form.reset_from_results_tooltip: Add or remove columns from query results. You won't lose your specific column settings, if their associated field is still present in the query.
table_form.subtitle: Run the query at least once to detect columns in order to configure them.
table_form.title: Table settings
table_form.you_can_drag_n_drop_column: You can change the column's position with a drag'n drop.

text_view.add_on_click: Click on a parameter/column to insert it in the editor, at the cursor position
text_view.placeholders: You can use report parameters' value ([parameter]) and table columns' value ({column}) in the text.
text_view.run_sql: You have to run the SQL query to see the columns.

dataview.title_placeholder: If set, used instead of data view's name
dataview.warning_register_init_code: Editing this JS code can break the data view.

cache_job.warning_label_date: Chaque dates sélectionnées génèrera un nouveau set de paramètres en entrée.
cache_job.warning_label_select: Chaque valeurs sélectionnées génèrera un nouveau set de paramètres en entrée

form.available_public_access_tooltip: This parameter will be available when this report is run from a remote website. (see report, sharing options)
form.close_and_edit_data_view: Close and edit the data view
form.close_and_open_layout_view: Close and open the layout setup
form.following_parameter_next_to_this_one: Following parameter next to this one
form.help_description_listing: Will appears only in the report listing in the home tab.
form.help_public_authorized_referers: For example, coma separated: hostname, hostname.tld, sub.hostname.tld
form.help_parameter_placeholder:
Report's parameters name within brackets, ex: [fromDate]
will be replaced by their related values
form.name_placeholder: Used by default as report's title
form.report_permission_fully_opened: All users can access this report.
form.title_placeholder: If set, used instead of report's name

grid_layout.data_views_layout_updated: The data views layout has been saved.
grid_layout.disabled_layout_message: The current window width (< 1200px) does not allow the layout modification.
grid_layout.enabled_layout_message: The current window width allows the layout modification.

report_link.allow_self_linking: Add a link to open this report in the same tab
report_link.empty_value_tooltip: Add link even if value is "empty" (for instance, when the value is 0, "", null)
report_link.here_we_list_only_report_with_input_para: Here, are displayed only reports with input parameters
report_link.input_parameters_linked_report: Input parameters of the linked report
report_link.label: Label
report_link.external_column_link_label_uniqueness: This label already exists. Two external links cannot use the same label.
report_link.external_column_link_url_info: You can use report parameters' value ([[parameter]]) and table columns' value ({{column}}) in the URL
report_link.external_column_link_url_add_on_click: Click on a parameter/column to insert it in the URL, at the cursor position
report_link.same_report_linked_explanation: By default when a user clicks on a link, a new tab is opened with the linked report. As you want to create a link on this report, the very one on which you are working, it is possible to have an additional link that does not open a new tab, allowing the report to be filtered without the need to display the report input parameters in the menu bar
report_link.tooltip_input_param_from_linked_report: Variable name of the input parameter of the linked report
report_link.tooltip_label: If only one link is configured, the label will be shown as a tooltip over the column's value.
report_link.tooltip_value_type_column_value: The value used for this parameter will correspond to the value of one of the columns of this report, to be selected from the drop-down list on the right.
report_link.tooltip_value_type_report_param_value: The value used for this parameter will correspond to one of the input parameters of this report, to be selected in the drop-down list on the right.
